name: Email Reminder (EN)
subject: Appointment Reminder
content:
Dear {applicant_name},

This is a reminder of your upcoming appointment on {appointment_date} at {VAC_address}.

Please bring your:
- Appointment Reference Number
- Biometric Instruction Letter (for biometric collection appointment only)
- Other documentation requested by IRCC

If you need to cancel or reschedule please sign into your account or call us on {contact_number}.

See you soon!
The VAC Team
